Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the officer err in assessing humanitarian and compassionate (H&C) factors or applying the correct legal test?

Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Existence of unusual or disproportionate hardship

Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of supporting documentation for FGM risk and hardship claims
